channel.title: 909 Funk! - Zerram [Wild West/Jazzy]
channel.description:
Hi, this is my first song that I'm posting in this forum. https://youtu.be/lOSbJzuRd0I I will copy and paste the video desc. that tells you about it:
*I made this song with the main drumkit being the 909 Dirt kirt. I have a bit of 808 clean for the fills every four bars as well. The bassline is sort of an echo of the high Wild West sound that I have going on with the bright horn. (I think it's a trumpet or a trombone), which you can hear starting at minute 0:16*
*I kept it very minimalistic with this one, with only one loop per track (although they all also have two or three automation loops as well, due to the break). I hope you like it! ~Z*
Please give me feedback and suggestions and stuff. Thanks!

item.title: 909 Funk! - Zerram [Wild West/Jazzy]
item.dc:creator: Zerram
item.description:
Hi, this is my first song that I’m posting in this forum.

https://www.youtube.com/embed/lOSbJzuRd0I


I will copy and paste the video desc. that tells you about it:

I made this song with the main drumkit being the 909 Dirt kirt. I have a bit of 808 clean for the fills every four bars as well. The bassline is sort of an echo of the high Wild West sound that I have going on with the bright horn. (I think it’s a trumpet or a trombone), which you can hear starting at minute 0:16

I kept it very minimalistic with this one, with only one loop per track (although they all also have two or three automation loops as well, due to the break). I hope you like it! ~Z

Please give me feedback and suggestions and stuff.
Thanks!
